name: tracearr
description: Tracearr is a monitoring platform for Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby. Track streams in real-time, dig into playback analytics, and spot account sharing before it gets out of hand.

variables.name: Postgres Database URL
variables.description: Postgres Database URL in following Format: postgres://tracearr:tracearr@postgres:5432/tracearr

variables.name: Redis URL
variables.description: Redis URL in following Format: redis://redis:6379

variables.name: JWT Secret
variables.description: Generate in MOS CLI with "openssl rand -hex 32"

variables.name: Cookie Secret
variables.description: Generate in MOS CLI with "openssl rand -hex 32"

variables.name: CORS_ORIGIN
variables.description: CORS origin (* for all origins, or specific domain like https://your-domain.com)
